CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly switch between 3D and 2D perspective using Equirectangular projection.
CONTROLS.NAME: perspective

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Just move the X-axis to spin about your main axis, or move the Y-axis to tilt forwards or backwards.
CONTROLS.NAME: look_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Zoom in and out of the input media.
CONTROLS.NAME: zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Pan input media in any direction.
CONTROLS.NAME: position

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically pan input media in any direction.
CONTROLS.NAME: velocity

DESCRIPTION: Smoothly switch between 3D and 2D perspective using Equirectangular projection.
TITLE: Equirectangular
